issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: Signifies completion of tasks, info requests, etc.
resolution.name: Completed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
*Assessment*

While testing EUCA-11071, it was noticed that if an instance profile is created in one region, when the instance is launched in another region, the instance profile is accessible, however the credentials are seen as invalid.
_Example from instance in region 'big-grams'.  Instance profile was created in region 'future'_:
{code}
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/security-credentials; echo
S3-ACTIONS
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/security-credentials/S3-ACTIONS/ ; echo
AccessKeyId
Expiration
SecretAccessKey
Token
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/security-credentials/S3-ACTIONS/Expiration; echo
2015-10-08T20:58:48Z
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ date
Thu Oct  8 19:59:29 UTC 2015
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/security-credentials/S3-ACTIONS/AccessKeyId; echo
AKIACXFSGAWPCA4IDFQ5
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/security-credentials/S3-ACTIONS/SecretAccessKey; echo
rBLPKnAiEdHuMST0WoWny9e39NQ9bR2iw3fv3wVl
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/iam/security-credentials/S3-ACTIONS/Token; echo
ZXVjYQABJ8JbxG8MqT7Oe3WNgvqBcbhHxK28bsX2tsrUXyBw6/mbVfUht6M1GpH43eGpt95KtqMgQebSjJQlNR/Nwjk5STT8xhpuyT7VhCVZG4mNvrH0gD5mj/Z8+8S2zjrHWYt7fc1ctAAfywFDxcvvy4d/Wg35zp34rVuMK7ZeyMIicNiKZKLUFmhxirwvokH3S5tkoNKveIAu6/zOHMo951mxjIfCxFYFn8Qm4cC0rckrbf8Fo7mQs/pp
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ ./s3cmd/s3cmd ls
ERROR: S3 error: 403 (InvalidAccessKeyId): The AWS Access Key Id you provided does not exist in our records.
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ curl http://169.254.169.254/latest/meta-data/placement/availability-zone; echo
big-grams
{code}
_Using configuration file for 'future' region_:
{code}
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-154:~$ ./s3cmd/s3cmd -c .s3cfg-future ls
2015-10-06 14:45  s3://admin-logs
2015-10-08 18:25  s3://euca-11071
2015-10-06 17:08  s3://ubuntu-core-x86_64-hvm-10-Apr-2015
2015-10-06 17:58  s3://ubuntu-wily-docker-x86-64
{code}

*Steps*

# Set up two Eucalyptus 4.2 (4.2.0-0.0.23957.682.20151001git294b61a.el6) cloud with Eucalyptus DNS enabled
#* [hspencer-1487|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1487/]
#* [hspencer-1486|http://jenkins.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com/job/Quick%20Launch%20Master/1486/]
# Use region-configuration script to create region-configuration file:
{code}
# ./region-config-tool.py region_name=future,cloud_cert=future-cert.pem,domain_name=d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com region_name=big-grams,cloud_cert=big-grams-region-cert.pem,domain_name=c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com -f region-config.json

[root@d-02 ~]# cat region-config.json
{
    "Regions": [
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "B1:94:FF:9A:BC:2A:2D:95:89:E1:8B:2A:9E:6E:14:AD:20:88:D8:9A:97:44:17:4B:F8:1F:EB:98:08:0D:00:DE",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                1
            ],
            "Name": "future",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        },
        {
            "CertificateFingerprint": "EB:74:48:EA:12:82:BB:4E:7D:B0:AA:04:51:F2:34:7E:D5:63:7A:E3:E8:03:A0:92:90:D7:2A:52:EE:76:5D:D8",
            "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256",
            "IdentifierPartitions": [
                2
            ],
            "Name": "big-grams",
            "Services": [
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://identity.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "identity"
                },
                {
                    "Endpoints": [
                        "http://compute.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
                    ],
                    "Type": "compute"
                }
            ]
        }
    ]
}
{code}
# Set region_name value on both clouds:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euctl region.region_name=future --region @localhost
region.region_name = future

[root@e-18 ~]# euctl region.region_name=big-grams --region @localhost
region.region_name = big-grams
{code}
# Uploaded region configuration file on both clouds:
{code}
[root@e-18 ~]# euctl region.region_configuration=@region-config.json --region @localhost
[root@e-18 ~]# euctl region.region_configuration --region @localhost --dump
{
  "Regions": [
    {
      "IdentifierPartitions": [
        1
      ],
      "Services": [
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://identity.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "identity"
        },
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "compute"
        }
      ],
      "Name": "future",
      "CertificateFingerprint": "B1:94:FF:9A:BC:2A:2D:95:89:E1:8B:2A:9E:6E:14:AD:20:88:D8:9A:97:44:17:4B:F8:1F:EB:98:08:0D:00:DE",
      "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256"
    },
    {
      "IdentifierPartitions": [
        2
      ],
      "Services": [
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://identity.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "identity"
        },
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://compute.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "compute"
        }
      ],
      "Name": "big-grams",
      "CertificateFingerprint": "EB:74:48:EA:12:82:BB:4E:7D:B0:AA:04:51:F2:34:7E:D5:63:7A:E3:E8:03:A0:92:90:D7:2A:52:EE:76:5D:D8",
      "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256"
    }
  ]
}

[root@d-02 ~]# euctl region.region_configuration=@region-config.json --region @localhost
[root@d-02 ~]# euctl region.region_configuration --region @localhost --dump
{
  "Regions": [
    {
      "IdentifierPartitions": [
        1
      ],
      "Services": [
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://identity.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "identity"
        },
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "compute"
        }
      ],
      "Name": "future",
      "CertificateFingerprint": "B1:94:FF:9A:BC:2A:2D:95:89:E1:8B:2A:9E:6E:14:AD:20:88:D8:9A:97:44:17:4B:F8:1F:EB:98:08:0D:00:DE",
      "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256"
    },
    {
      "IdentifierPartitions": [
        2
      ],
      "Services": [
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://identity.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "identity"
        },
        {
          "Endpoints": [
            "http://compute.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/"
          ],
          "Type": "compute"
        }
      ],
      "Name": "big-grams",
      "CertificateFingerprint": "EB:74:48:EA:12:82:BB:4E:7D:B0:AA:04:51:F2:34:7E:D5:63:7A:E3:E8:03:A0:92:90:D7:2A:52:EE:76:5D:D8",
      "CertificateFingerprintDigest": "SHA-256"
    }
  ]
}
{code}
# Set {{region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames}} to False since HTTP is being used on this setup:
{code}
[root@e-18 ~]# euctl region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames=false --region @localhost
region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames = false

[root@d-02 ~]# euctl region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames=false --region @localhost
region.region_ssl_verify_hostnames = false
{code}
# Confirmed both clouds were configured correctly for federation:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region @future
REGION	big-grams	http://compute.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

[root@e-18 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region @big-grams
REGION	big-grams	http://compute.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
{code}
# Created non-'eucalyptus' account
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-accountcreate -a development-operations --region @future
development-operations	001373439898

[root@d-02 ~]# euare-accountlist --region @future
development-operations	001373439898
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-accountlist --region @future
(eucalyptus)database	000486636942
(eucalyptus)cloudformation	000583227594
(eucalyptus)imaging	000298465834
(eucalyptus)loadbalancing	000743233981
(eucalyptus)blockstorage	000507174146
development-operations	001373439898
eucalyptus	000101784746
(eucalyptus)objectstorage	000990001069
(eucalyptus)aws-exec-read	000406676951
{code}
# Added access and secret keys to 'developement-operations/admin' user
# Created role in region 'future'
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-rolecreate -s http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/ S3-ACTIONS --region devops-admin@future
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-rolelistbypath --region devops-admin@future
arn:aws:iam::001373439898:role/S3-ACTIONS
{code}
# Attached policy to role:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-rolelistpolicies -r S3-ACTIONS -v --region devops-admin@future
s3-all-actions
{
  "Version": "2012-10-17",
  "Statement": [
    {
      "Sid": "Stmt1444323010930",
      "Action": "s3:*",
      "Effect": "Allow",
      "Resource": "*"
    }
  ]
}

IsTruncated: false
{code}
# Created instance profile based off 'S3-ACTIONS' role:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-instanceprofilecreate -r S3-ACTIONS instance-s3-actions --region devops-admin@future
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-instanceprofilelistbypath --region devops-admin@future
arn:aws:iam::001373439898:instance-profile/instance-s3-actions
{code}
# Confirmed instance profile can be viewed under each region:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-regions --region devops-admin@future
REGION	big-grams	http://compute.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/
REGION	future	http://compute.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com:8773/

[root@d-02 ~]# euare-instanceprofilelistbypath --region devops-admin@future
arn:aws:iam::001373439898:instance-profile/instance-s3-actions
[root@d-02 ~]# euare-instanceprofilelistbypath --region devops-admin@big-grams
arn:aws:iam::001373439898:instance-profile/instance-s3-actions
{code}
# Launched instance in each region:
{code}
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region devops-admin@future
RESERVATION	r-a02219f6	001373439898	default
INSTANCE	i-b027d1a5	emi-82739064	euca-10-111-30-166.eucalyptus.d-02.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-212.eucalyptus.internal	running	devops-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2015-10-08T16:57:04.785Z	honest				monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.166	10.111.30.212			instance-store					hvm			sg-35948a57			arn:aws:iam::001373439898:instance-profile/instance-s3-actions	x86_64
[root@d-02 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region devops-admin@big-grams
RESERVATION	r-adcea9c1	001373439898	default
INSTANCE	i-f125d587	emi-0ed453f9	euca-10-111-30-12.eucalyptus.c-40.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-30-154.eucalyptus.internal	running	devops-admin	0		m1.xlarge	2015-10-08T16:57:38.535Z	big-grams				monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.12	10.111.30.154			instance-store					hvm			sg-2c11df1a			arn:aws:iam::001373439898:instance-profile/instance-s3-actions	x86_64
{code}
# Authorized SSH to each instance security group
# SSHed into each instance, and installed git, python-dateutil, and python-magic
# Cloned [s3cmd from Github|https://github.com/s3tools/s3cmd]
# Used {{./s3cmd/s3cmd --configure}} to set up credentials on each instance
# Confirmed that the configuration file contained all the correct information:
{code}
### instance in 'future' region ###
ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-212:~$ cat .s3cfg

{code}

ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-212:~$ ./s3cmd/s3cmd ls

fields.summary: Instance Profile Credentials Not Authorized Globally

comments.body:
Fixed.

Eucalyptus Version: {{4.2.0-0.0.24053.722.20151016gitc583eb2.el6}}

*Steps*

# Followed the steps mentioned in the 'Description' above.  Results from instances in each region.
#* _Region 'future'_
{code}
[root@g-26-03 ~]# euca-describe-instances --region devops-admin@future
RESERVATION	r-c3b11b12	001827830003	default
INSTANCE	i-b8c314a6	emi-f4424d9c	euca-10-111-30-221.eucalyptus.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com	euca-10-111-31-106.eucalyptus.internal	running	devops-admin	0		m1.medium	2015-10-17T19:27:08.936Z	ds2				monitoring-disabled	10.111.30.221	10.111.31.106			instance-store					hvm			sg-88607d62			arn:aws:iam::001827830003:instance-profile/instance-s3-actions	x86_64

[root@g-26-03 ~]# ssh -i devops-admin-future.priv ubuntu@euca-10-111-30-221.eucalyptus.c-09.autoqa.qa1.eucalyptus-systems.com
Welcome to Ubuntu Wily Werewolf (development branch) (GNU/Linux 4.2.0-16-generic x86_64)

 * Documentation:  https://help.ubuntu.com/

  Get cloud support with Ubuntu Advantage Cloud Guest:
    http://www.ubuntu.com/business/services/cloud


Last login: Sat Oct 17 19:37:24 2015 from 10.111.5.168
ubuntu@euca-10-111-31-106:~$ cat .s3cfg
